Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
08.05.2013 SH SCR18120 Added test on file size > 0 to start importing the files via the BPH300 submodules
22.10.2012 SH SCR17529 Added sorting of files to UTF-8 via GB324
05.07.2012 SH SCR17415 Added FileExist() after delay of 1 minute to prevent MSGW if file is removed in the meanwhile
25.04.2012 SH SR17277 Payments via Webservice: Added BPH361.PI.TBWR_NO
19.04.2012 SH SCR17239 IBOL modules: Disabled deletion of TBWR rows, deleted now in the BPH361/BAD002IBOL
18.04.2012 SH SCR17259 Added BPH300-6.PI.FILENAME
27.03.2012 SH SCR17223 Changed IBOL modules to delete TBWR rows
07.02.2012 SH SCR17108 Removed range From TWBR_DATE_SCHEDULE in webservice modules
22.12.2011 SH SCR16974 Added module "Advances via webservice"
15.11.2011 GB SCR16804 Added call the BPH306, BPH307, BPH300-6, BPH300-7
16.10.2011 GB SCR16804 Added the Payments via webservice
26.01.2011 SH SCR16075 Fixed bug regarding timestamp of copied files
22.12.2010 SH SCR16084 Added delay(600) = 1 mintue to handle every file
22.12.2010 SH SCR16075 Turned job to MSGW if move of files to handled directory
16.04.2010 SH SCR1566x Added BPH303 (ETEBAC))
09.04.2010 SH SCR15376 Added BPH302 (CODA) and BPH305 (LACAIXA)
-- Initializations
-- Get directory (8 = bank files)
-- Payments from IFS
-- Payments/Advances via webservice
.. in case of directory does not exists --> MSGW
-- Get files from directory (8) = bank files (Do not use '*.*' for FileLIstGet()
otherwise files without extension are not scanned)
-- All existing files of all subfolders in \BANKS have to be handled
-- Wait 1 minutes to avoid problems with files from IFS which are not finally
... check if file still exists, perhaps removed by the users when they copy files to \New directory by mistake

ExpSyntax.val: Trim (Str ({0,2},'9'))&' new bank files will be handled now'

Text.val: -- Check / extract subdirectory and prepare diff. directories for further use
-- Create directories if does not exist
... /Handled
... if create of new directorry failed --> MSGW
... no file encoding, calling program read file with XML direct access (already UTF-8 encoded)
... no file encoding, calling program read file with XML direct access (already UTF-8 encoded)
-- If the file is handled (also in case of errors) then move the file to
the "Handled" directory
... and finally delete the current handled file (only if file is copied
-- Rename original file (add extension .EBC)
-- Prepare path/file delimeter for the use in i5 command
-- Convert file from EBCDIC to ASCII
...error message if conversion was not successful
-- Move original .EBC file to handled dirctory
-- Set ASCII file for further use in BPH300
-- Get NFPR_RUNNUMBER / NFPR_RUNNUMBER_WKA
-- BPH361 is called from G.S. because the current selected TBWR row will be deleted
at the end of BPH361 in case of no errors in the webservice procedures
-- BAD002IBOL is called from G.S. because the current selected TBWR row will be deleted
at the end of BAD002IBOL in case of no errors in the webservice procedures
